name: Cardamaro Concord Cocktail
description: Cardamaro paired with robust bourbon and bright, fresh Concord grape puree makes for an ideal drink to usher in fall.
recipeYield: 1 cocktail, makes enough Concord puree for 4 cocktails
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups concord grapes, stems removed (8 ounces with stems)

recipeInstructions.text: For the Concord Grape Puree: Puree the grapes on medium until only small pieces of skin remain. Strain through a fine mesh sieve, pressing and stirring the solids to extract as much liquid as possible. Discard the solids, stir the lemon juice into the the resulting liquid, and refrigerate if not using immediately.

For the Cocktail: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add bourbon, Concord grape puree, Cardamaro, and simple syrup. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled old fashioned glass.
